column2: we get many diverse client requests & being in Chicago
column3: the "Taste of Chicago" request comes up quite often.  Now
column5: a Taste of Chicago menu would not be complete without deep dish pizza & Lou's is always our go to!  They have always been more than accommodating to our & our client's requests & go above and beyond to make sure all parties involved are satisfied.  Delivery staff is always prompt and friendly; we know we can always count on Lou's!
